text: (napiye!) Innum nir kuruviraka"intac cattiya (vetam) unkal iraivanitamiruntu (vantu)llatu" akave, virumpupavar (atanai) nampi kollattum. Inanum virumpupavar (atanai) nirakarikkattum. Aniyayak kararkalukku (naraka) neruppai niccayamaka nam cittappatuttiyullom; (anneruppin) cuvar avarkalaic culntu kollum; avarkal (tannir kettu) iratcikkat tetinal urukkappatta cempu ponra tanniraik konte iratcikkappatuvarkal. (Avarkalutaiya) mukankalai atu cuttuk karukki vitum; mikak ketana panamakum atu! Innum, irankum talattil atuve mikak kettatakum
